data.name: Negligee: Girls Night
data.detailed_description:
Hannah has been the manager of the Negligee lingerie store for a while now and thanks mostly to her it has become a massive success, so much so that her old manager Karen has returned and become another part owner and invester in the franchise. Now the two need to rebuild their relationship so they can work together what better way than with a night out just the two of them.

This game follows Hannah as the protagonist as she goes on a girls night with Karen her former boss.

What happens and how the night ends will be up to your decisions during this game.
This is a fun, tongue in cheek story of lustful urges and workplace romance.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: This is a fun, tongue in cheek story of lustful urges and workplace romance. As two women go on a night out together to reaffirm their friendship as they start to work together once more.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.50 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

Minimum:

  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

  • Graphics: 1920x1080
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:

content_descriptors.notes:
This game includes adult content between two women, showing them kissing as well as having deeper intimate relationships and sex scenes between them. It also depicts the characters in lingerie and other revealing clothing.

All characters depicted within the game are 18 years of age or older.
